hr.fer.zemris.java.hw12.jvdraw.geometricalobjects

Interface GeometricalObject

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Circle, FilledCircle, Line

    public interface GeometricalObject
    Interface represents geometrical object intended for painting on Graphics
    Author:
    Borna

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default String colorToString(Color color)
      Return color as string with R G B components
      String export()
      Returns object as string for exporting in file
      int getMaxX()
      Returns maximum x coordinate
      int getMaxY()
      Returns maximum y coordinate
      int getMinX()
      Returns minimum x coordinate
      int getMinY()
      Returns minimum y coordinate
      JPanel getProperty()
      Returns JPanel with object properties and buttons for setting new one.
      void mouseMoved(int x, int y)
      Geometrical object sets new parameters depending on mouse position
      void paint(Graphics g)
      Paint component on graphics
      void setOffset(int x, int y)
      Sets offset for painting on Graphics used for exporting as image

    • Method Detail

      • getProperty

        y - y coordinate of mouse

      • setOffset

        void setOffset(int x,
               int y)
        Sets offset for painting on Graphics used for exporting as image
        Parameters:
        x - initial x coordinate for painting
        y - initial y coordinate for painting
